name: Space Shadow Wolves
description:
• Movement -  
    • WASD or 
    • Arrow Keys or
    • Gamepad analog stick
  • Fire laser - 
    • Spacebar or 
    • Gamepad button 3 or 
    • Gampad bumpers
  • Sprint - 
    • Shift key or 
    • Gampad analog down button
for: Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 Your spacecraft crashed on a Dark Alien Planet It's just you and your personal robot against the hoard of Shadow Wolves. Work Together or Die! The choice is up to you: Use your laser to destroy the wolves or stay close to the robot's light to survive.  Either way you and your robot must work together to survive. You need your robot to ward off the shadow wolves and guide you out.  Your robot needs you to provide suppressive fire against the aggressive wolves.

Adam Biggs and Jeff Biggs
